channel.title: Comments on: Chintus burning down fictional characters now. Yeh kaisi supremacy hai ü§£

item.title: By: Moist-Performance-73
item.dc:creator: Moist-Performance-73
item.description:
FYI Santa Clause was based on a real person specifically Saint Nicholas a christian saint from the 3rd century CE
the entire gift giving bit is from a story where Saint Nicholas actually gives money to a poor family in secret in order to save their daughters from being forced into prostitution
item.content:encoded:
FYI Santa Clause was based on a real person specifically Saint Nicholas a christian saint from the 3rd century CE

the entire gift giving bit is from a story where Saint Nicholas actually gives money to a poor family in secret in order to save their daughters from being forced into prostitution

item.title: By: deshdrohi20
item.dc:creator: deshdrohi20
item.description: It's fine, at least it's better than them burning down churches.
item.content:encoded: It’s fine, at least it’s better than them burning down churches.

item.title: By: twitterInfo_bot

item.description:

A far right Hindu group burned an effigy of Santa Claus in North Indian city of Agra. They also shouted slogans like ‚ÄúDeath to Santa‚Äù outside St Johns College.
